pr_title: July patch release preparation for AppConfig, TA and FR

timeline.message: July Release for AppConfig and Text Analytics

timeline.bodyText: Need to wait until Identity 1.0.8 release is out.
timeline.author: samvaity
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -116,7 +116,7 @@ Authentication with AAD requires some initial setup:
 <dependency>
     <groupId>com.azure</groupId>
     <artifactId>azure-identity</artifactId>
-    <version>1.0.6</version>
+    <version>1.0.7</version>

timeline.message: update Identity version and form recognizer version

timeline.bodyText:
@JimSuplizio  I think the version is not updated in readme after Identity released.
https://github.com/Azure/azure-sdk-for-java/tree/master/sdk/textanalytics/azure-ai-textanalytics#create-a-text-analytics-client-with-azure-active-directory-credential
timeline.author: mssfang
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -116,7 +116,7 @@ Authentication with AAD requires some initial setup:
 <dependency>
     <groupId>com.azure</groupId>
     <artifactId>azure-identity</artifactId>
-    <version>1.0.6</version>
+    <version>1.0.8</version>

replies.bodyText: Adding @g2vinay. With GA identity being released out of a feature branch and the dependency version being updated by hand after that release, it looks like this may have just been missed.
replies.author: JimSuplizio
